mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.program_id AS "programId.id", a.cast_id AS "castId.id", a.cast_type AS "castType", a.status AS "status", a.sort AS "sort", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.remark1 AS "remark1", cmsCast.name AS "castId.name", cmsProgram.name AS "programId.name"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_program_cast( id, program_id, cast_id, cast_type, status, sort, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remarks, remark1 ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{programId.id}, #{castId.id}, #{castType}, #{status}, #{sort}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks}, #{remark1} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cms_program_cast SET program_id = #{programId.id}, cast_id = #{castId.id}, cast_type = #{castType}, status = #{status}, sort = #{sort}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, remark1 = #{remark1} WHERE id = #{id}
